A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wanted this movie to continue on the path of Force Awakens....but it doesn’t. Clunky dialog and blotted plot seriously hold this one back from staying true to what JJ Abrams set in place. It’s such a shame because this one has so much potential to show things we haven’t seen in the Star Wars universe SINCE Empire but falls short. This isn’t going to be an Episode I rewatch :(
